sentences: Röövisid kauplusi ja tapsid rahulikke elanikke.
Bandiidid röövisid kaubanduspunkte ja tekitasid paanikat linnas.
context: The word 'röövisid' is the past tense plural form of the Estonian verb 'röövima', which means to rob or plunder. It refers to the act of stealing property from someone, often by force or threat of violence. The dictionary definition indicates this relates to armed robbery and criminal activity.
